summary: The self-driving car is traveling on a dark road at night. From 0.0s to 3.0s, a motorcycle with a rider wearing a white jacket and a helmet is seen on the right side of the road, moving in the same direction as the car. From 3.0s to 6.0s, the motorcycle is driving on the right side of the road. From 6.0s to 14.2s, the motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road. At 11.4s, a person wearing a white jacket and dark pants is standing next to the motorcycle on the right side of the road. The person then starts to cross the road from right to left at 13.3s, potentially creating a ghost probing situation.

characters.behavior: riding on the right side of the road, then parked on the right side of the road
standing next to the motorcycle, then crossing the road from right to left

key_objects: Right side: A person wearing a white jacket and dark pants, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the road from right to left, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate or stop.
actions: The vehicle is driving straight on a dark road at night. The driver is maintaining a consistent speed, likely due to the limited visibility and the presence of other vehicles on the road. The vehicle is staying in its lane, possibly to avoid any unexpected obstacles or movements from other road users.
